Eu não lembro quando foi que vi esse jogo pela primeira vez, mas o cenário distópico foi a grande primeira impressão que me deixou. Tudo nesse jogo é interessante e foda.

ce jeu, malgré sa viellesse, n'a jamais veilli avec moi.
Ce chef d'oeuvre graphique et musical est une pépite quand vous cherchez un jeu d'un telle qualité.

Half life 2 est un chef d'oeuvre, la VF est magnifique, et la musique nous met parfaitement dans cette ambiance de monde dévasté par la guerre. Les décors sont plus que beau et les méchaniques de gameplay complexe, rendant a cette oeuvre un gameplay inédit.

Oyun her yöden çok güzel, hikayesi, oynanış ve daha neler.
ama birkaç sorunu var, 1. olarak taşıtları sürmek kamera açısı yüzünden çok zor
2. olarak grafikler çok iyi diyemem (bunu pek önemsemenize gerek yok çünkü internette modlar var HD texture ve shaderlar var)

Game is fun. Though sometimes you may need to watch a walkthrough if you are new, which is no shame in doing, this game is great and has some funny lines here and there. Would highly recommend if you dont have the greatest wallet or PC.
Good pacing and puzzles but otherwise Eh
First time playing it.....even today this game holds up well. Good story and gameplay mechanics

Howdy partner! Do you like sci-fi? Do you like hal- nvm Do you like Half Life 1? Well. if you havent heard of this, you must be under a rock!
Пришло и мое время написать обзор на эту игру. Что тут можно сказать, отличное продолжение классики. Рекомендую.

Bu fiyata bu sistem gereksinimine alabileceğiniz tartışmasız en iyi oyun. Oyun süresi bakımından da çok ideal (10-15 saat) Seriye girmek için Black Mesa'yı alın (half life remake) sonra da buna yardırın pişman olmazsınız
A classic. Good gameplay and good graphics.
It's half life, what can i say. Its a really really good game
I fucking hate water hazard, it makes my head spin

I played this because I played the first one. It is better than the first one, more action. It was a improvement in all the right ways. I honestly can't say a word against it. I would play it again, like the first one and then let it sit for 10 more years. It's good it's fun it's safe.

The graphics are stunning for its age and it runs well on MAX settings on my IHD 4000 laptop which cant even play minecraft except if i use the lowest settings.
 The gameplay and combat feels very fun and although im bad at shooter games, this one isnt too hard on medium difficulty, but also not easy.
 The futuristic weapons and the crossbow are very cool. The story is interesting and you also have to think about some puzzles, altough until now i havent encountered too hard and interesting ones, I havent finished it yet though.
 For 8€, this is a fantastic game to pick up. The only bad thing about it the game is the part where you have to ride on that jetski-like thing, as it was too long for me. Pther than that tho, great game.
 I recommend getting the Orange Box for double the price to get HL Episode 1 and 2 as well, plus Portal and TF2.

Çıkışının ardından neredeyse 16,5 yıl geçmesine rağmen Half Life 2, hala günümüz oyunlara diz çöktüren,ilerleyebilecekleri bir yol çizen atmosfere,oynanışa,fiziklere ve kurguya sahip(grafikler de pek rahatsız etmiyor).Half Life 2'nin,her türlü oyuncunun en azından 1 kere deneyimlemesi gerken bir şaheser olduğunu düşünüyorum.Keşke çıktığı dönemde oynama imkanım olsaydı...

It's a good game,  but some of the glitches prevent you from completing the game. Like the one in 'Our Benefactors', when the thing you were supposed to get in teleports to the start of it's cycle instead of going into the bright tunnel. This crap is fricked (Replace crap and frick with more vulgure terms). But this game IS good, and anyone who hasn't played it should get it.
Wierna kontynuacja kultowej gry z 1998 roku, po prostu legenda. Bardzo gorąco polecam
bu oyunu gerçekten sevmek istiyorum  sevemiyorum oyun beni sıkıyor ve hikayesi çok kötü geliyor..
I've been a huge fan since the first half-life was released and I still enjoy playing most of the other games from steam and valve
